trans-unit.source: See mpl_toolkits.mplot3d.axis3d._axinfo for a dictionary containing constants that may be modified for controlling the look and feel of mplot3d axes (e.g., label spacing, font colors and panel colors). Historically, axis3d has suffered from having hard-coded constants that precluded user adjustments, and this dictionary was implemented in version 1.1 as a stop-gap measure.
trans-unit.target: 有关包含常量的字典，请参见 mpl_toolkits.mplot3d.axis3d._axinfo ，该常量可以进行修改以控制mplot3d轴的外观和感觉（例如，标签间距，字体颜色和面板颜色）。从历史上看，axis3d的代码常量很难进行用户调整，因此该字典在1.1版中作为权宜之计而实现。

trans-unit.source: Selects which ticklabels to rotate.
Selects which ticklabels to rotate. Default is None which works the same as major.
trans-unit.target: 选择要旋转的ticklabels。默认值是None,与主键相同。

trans-unit.source: Semantically, where is often used for x1 > x2 or similar. By default, the nodes of the polygon defining the filled region will only be placed at the positions in the y array. Such a polygon cannot describe the above semantics close to the intersection. The y-sections containing the intersection are simply clipped.
trans-unit.target: 语义上，在那里经常用于X1 > X2或类似。默认情况下，定义填充区域的面的节点将仅放置在y数组中的位置。这样的多边形无法在相交附近描述上述语义。包含相交的y截面被简单地裁剪。

trans-unit.source: Semantically, where is often used for y1 > y2 or similar. By default, the nodes of the polygon defining the filled region will only be placed at the positions in the x array. Such a polygon cannot describe the above semantics close to the intersection. The x-sections containing the intersection are simply clipped.
trans-unit.target: 语义上，在那里经常用于Y1 > Y2或相似。默认情况下，定义填充区域的面的节点将仅放置在x数组中的位置。这样的多边形无法在相交附近描述上述语义。包含相交的x截面被简单地裁剪。

trans-unit.source: Separation between the label and the size bar, in points.

trans-unit.target: 标签和尺寸条之间的间隔,以点为单位。默认为2。

trans-unit.source: Separator used between the value and the prefix/unit. For example, one get '3.14 mV' if sep is " " (default) and '3.14mV' if sep is "". Besides the default behavior, some other useful options may be:
trans-unit.target: 值和前缀/单位之间使用的分隔符。例如，一个获得“3.14 MV”如果 sep 是“”（默认）和“3.14mV”如果 sep 是“”。除了默认行为，其他一些有用的选项可能是：

trans-unit.source: Sequence of (func, args, kwargs) where func(*args, **kwargs) will be executed by the timer every interval.
trans-unit.target: （func，args，kwargs）的序列，其中 func(*args, **kwargs) 将在每个时间间隔由计时器执行。

trans-unit.source: Sequence of nice numbers starting with 1 and ending with 10; e.g., [1, 2, 4, 5, 10], where the values are acceptable tick multiples. i.e. for the example, 20, 40, 60 would be an acceptable set of ticks, as would 0.4, 0.6, 0.8, because they are multiples of 2. However, 30, 60, 90 would not be allowed because 3 does not appear in the list of steps.
trans-unit.target: 例如,[1,2,4,5,10],其中的数值是可接受的刻度倍数。例如,在这个例子中,20,40,60是一组可接受的刻度,0.4,0.6,0.8也是可接受的刻度,因为它们是2的倍数。

Set how offsets are applied. If offset_position is 'screen' (default) the offset is applied after the master transform has been applied, that is, the offsets are in screen coordinates. trans-unit.source: Share the x-axis with other.
Share the y-axis with other.

Shared Axes (of which twinned Axes are a special case) impose restrictions on how aspect ratios can be imposed. For twinned Axes, use 'datalim'. For Axes that share both x and y, use 'box'. Otherwise, either 'datalim' or 'box' may be used. These limitations are partly a requirement to avoid over-specification, and partly a result of the particular implementation we are currently using, in which the adjustments for aspect ratios are done sequentially and independently on each Axes as it is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 共享轴(其中孪生轴是一种特殊情况)对如何施加长宽比施加限制。对于孪生轴,使用 "datalim"。对于共享 x 和 y 的 Axes,使用 "box"。否则,可以使用 "datalim "或 "box"。这些限制部分是为了避免过度规格化的要求,部分是我们目前使用的特殊实现的结果,在这种情况下,纵横比的调整是在每个Axes绘制时按顺序独立完成的。

trans-unit.source: Since boxes can be inside of boxes inside of boxes, the main work of Ship is done by two mutually recursive routines, hlist_out and vlist_out, which traverse the Hlist nodes and Vlist nodes inside of horizontal and vertical boxes. The global variables used in TeX to store state as it processes have become member variables here.
Since heavily importing into the global namespace may result in unexpected behavior, the use of pylab is strongly discouraged. Use matplotlib.pyplot instead.
trans-unit.target: 由于大量导入全局名称空间可能会导致意外行为，因此强烈建议不要使用pylab。请改用 matplotlib.pyplot 。

trans-unit.source: Since the values close to zero tend toward infinity, there is a need to have a range around zero that is linear. The parameter linthresh allows the user to specify the size of this range (-linthresh, linthresh).
trans-unit.target: 由于接近零的值趋于无穷大，因此需要在零附近具有线性范围。参数linthresh允许用户指定此范围的大小（-linthresh，linthresh）。

trans-unit.source: Snapping aligns positions with the pixel grid, which results in clearer images. For example, if a black line of 1px width was defined at a position in between two pixels, the resulting image would contain the interpolated value of that line in the pixel grid, which would be a grey value on both adjacent pixel positions. In contrast, snapping will move the line to the nearest integer pixel value, so that the resulting image will really contain a 1px wide black line.
trans-unit.target: Snapping将位置与像素网格对齐,从而使图像更加清晰。例如,如果在两个像素之间的位置定义了一条宽度为1px的黑线,那么生成的图像将包含该线在像素网格中的插值,在相邻的两个像素位置上都是灰色值。相反,啪啪啪会将该线移动到最接近的整数像素值,这样,生成的图像将真正包含一条1px宽的黑线。

trans-unit.source: Snapping is currently only supported by the Agg and MacOSX backends.
trans-unit.target: 目前只有Agg和MacOSX后端支持Snapping。

trans-unit.source: Some widgets, like the cursor, draw onto the canvas, and this is not desirable under all circumstances, like when the toolbar is in zoom-to-rect mode and drawing a rectangle. To avoid this, a widget can acquire a canvas' lock with canvas.widgetlock(widget) before drawing on the canvas; this will prevent other widgets from doing so at the same time (if they also try to acquire the lock first).
trans-unit.target: 某些小部件（例如光标）绘制在画布上，并且在所有情况下都不是理想的，例如当工具栏处于缩放到矩形模式并绘制矩形时。为了避免这种情况，小部件可以在canvas上绘制之前使用 canvas.widgetlock(widget) 获取canvas的锁。这样可以防止其他小部件同时执行此操作（如果它们还尝试先获取锁）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to bootstrap the confidence intervals around the median for notched boxplots. If bootstrap is None, no bootstrapping is performed, and notches are calculated using a Gaussian-based asymptotic approximation (see McGill, R., Tukey, J.W., and Larsen, W.A., 1978, and Kendall and Stuart, 1967). Otherwise, bootstrap specifies the number of times to bootstrap the median to determine its 95% confidence intervals. Values between 1000 and 10000 are recommended.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否在带槽的箱形图的中间值附近引导置信区间。如果 bootstrap 为None，则不执行自举，并且使用基于高斯的渐近逼近法来计算陷波（请参见McGill，R.，Tukey，JW和Larsen，WA，1978，和Kendall和Stuart，1967）。否则，引导程序指定对中值进行引导以确定其95％置信区间的次数。建议使用1000到10000之间的值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to bootstrap the confidence intervals around the median for notched boxplots. If bootstrap is None, no bootstrapping is performed, and notches are calculated using a Gaussian-based asymptotic approximation (see McGill, R., Tukey, J.W., and Larsen, W.A., 1978, and Kendall and Stuart, 1967). Otherwise, bootstrap specifies the number of times to bootstrap the median to determine its 95% confidence intervals. Values between 1000 and 10000 are recommended.

trans-unit.source: Starting and ending angles of the arc in degrees. These values are relative to angle, e.g. if angle = 45 and theta1 = 90 the absolute starting angle is 135. Default theta1 = 0, theta2 = 360, i.e. a complete ellipse. The arc is drawn in the counterclockwise direction. Angles greater than or equal to 360, or smaller than 0, are represented by an equivalent angle in the range [0, 360), by taking the input value mod 360.
trans-unit.target: 弧的开始和结束角度（以度为单位）。这些值是相对于角度的，例如，如果angle = 45且theta1 = 90，则绝对起始角度为135。默认theta1 = 0，theta2 = 360，即完整的椭圆。圆弧沿逆时针方向绘制。通过采用输入值mod 360，大于或等于360或小于0的角度由范围[0，360）内的等效角度表示。

Target number of elements to create. If None, use all unique elements of the mappable array. If an integer, target to use num elements in the normed range. If "auto", try to determine which option better suits the nature of the data. The number of created elements may slightly deviate from num due to a Locator being used to find useful locations. If a list or array, use exactly those elements for the legend. Finally, a Locator can be provided.

trans-unit.source: Technically there's a slight ambiguity in calls where the second label is a valid fmt. plot('n', 'o', data=obj) could be plt(x, y) or plt(y, fmt). In such cases, the former interpretation is chosen, but a warning is issued. You may suppress the warning by adding an empty format string plot('n', 'o', '', data=obj).
trans-unit.target: 从技术上讲，第二个标签是有效的fmt，呼叫中存在一些歧义。 plot('n', 'o', data=obj) 可以是 plt(x, y) 或 plt(y, fmt) 。在这种情况下，选择前一种解释，但会发出警告。您可以通过添加一个空的格式字符串 plot('n', 'o', '', data=obj) 来抑制该警告。
